code: import*as _ from"lodash";export var JD_ADVERTISE_SAVE_SUGGESTED_CANDIDATES_HANDLER="JD_ADVERTISE_SAVE_SUGGESTED_CANDIDATES_HANDLER";export var saveSuggestedCandidates=function saveSuggestedCandidates(value){return function(dispatch){var newValue=value.sort(function(a,b){return a.candidate_Matched_Stats.candidate_Matched_Percentage<b.candidate_Matched_Stats.candidate_Matched_Percentage?1:-1;});dispatch({type:JD_ADVERTISE_SAVE_SUGGESTED_CANDIDATES_HANDLER,payload:newValue});};};
